PartyIncome.name: PartyIncome
PartyIncome.description: Represents the income of an individual or a business entity. This income can be from salaries, commissions, fees, rental properties, and other sources.

ApplicationFormId.description: The application form that's submitted for a party income. Available with Digital Lending.

CalendarYear.description: The calendar year when the income was earned.

ClaimId.description: The claim associated with the party income.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: If multiple currencies are enabled, this field contains the currency ISO code associated with the record.

EmployerAddress.description: The compound form of the employer's address.

EmployerId.description: The employer associated with the party income.

EmployerPhone.description: The phone number of the employer.

EndDate.description: The date when the party income ends.

IncomeAmount.description: The amount of the party income.

IncomeAsOfDate.description: The date when the party income is documented. Available with Digital Lending.

IncomeFrequency.description: The frequency of the party income.

IncomeSourceId.description: The source of the income. Available with Digital Lending.

IncomeStatus.description: The status of the party income.

IsReadOnly.description: Indicates whether the party income is read only (true) or not (false).

JobTitle.description: The job title of the party.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view.

Name.description: The name of the party income.

OwnerId.description: The owner associated with the party income.

PartyId.description: The party associated with the party income.

PartyProfileId.description: The party profile associated with an applicant. Available with Digital Lending

StartDate.description: The date when the party income starts.

UsageType.description: Internal field. Specifies the application using the party income to populate data.

VerificationDate.description: The timestamp when the verification status is updated.

VerificationStatus.description: The verification status of the party income.
